name: We Found a Planet: THE GAME (DEMO) -Power Point Game
name_original: We Found a Planet: THE GAME (DEMO) -Power Point Game
description:
Game based on the movie i made We Found a Planet with a brand new story

Game runs entirely on Power Point you need nothing else to play it 

Make sure to play with volume on

If you never saw the movie i streamed it once - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fd-qWRTuKbU
